mapper.select: select distinct m.* from (WITH RECURSIVE etc AS (select tbl_orga.orga_no, tbl_orga.upper_orga_no, tbl_orga.orga_type from tbl_orga inner join tbl_emp_mapping eM on tbl_orga.orga_no = eM.orga_no inner join tbl_emp e on eM.emp_no = e.emp_no join tbl_dept_mapping d on tbl_orga.upper_orga_no = d.orga_no where username = #{username} # and d.dept_main = true UNION ALL select o.orga_no, o.upper_orga_no, o.orga_type from etc f inner join tbl_orga o on f.upper_orga_no = o.orga_no) select f.orga_no, f.orga_type from etc f) as f inner join tbl_orga_role o on o.orga_no = f.orga_no inner join tbl_role_group rg on o.role_group_no = rg.role_group_no join tbl_menu_role mr on rg.role_group_no = mr.role_group_no join tbl_menu m on mr.menu_no = m.menu_no order by f.orga_type
select * from tbl_menu where menu_path like CONCAT('/', #{menuCode}, '%') order by menu_order, menu_no

where m.upper_menu_no IS NULL
where m.upper_menu_no = #{menuNo}
